title: New: James Ferraro – Blood Flow
content:
James Ferraro isn’t an artist I’ve spent enough time with, despite his new Mixtape, Cold, due out via Hippos in Tank later this month.

The first drop, Blood Flow, is a dreary, highly percussive, scattered track, with breaks and snares treated as drops of ink, dripping amongst the track with a playful energy. There’s a sinister element to the piece that also resonates perfectly, the vocals almost sound like a sustained and obsessive humming session, words aren’t as powerful as sounds.

Cold is due out on March 25. grab it here on the day.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
